notFoundPage.heading: Oops! The page you're looking for isn't here.
notFoundPage.body: You might have the wrong address, or the page may have moved.

options.heading: Integrated Payment and Logistic System With A Built in Order Management System
options.paymentText: Secured payment powered by industry leaders.
options.orderText: Order management system integrated with logistics proividers.
options.logisticText: Optimised logistics for local and intercity shipment.

vendors.heroText: Vesko's online store helps you to boost your offline sales.
vendors.omnichannelText: The omnichannel system allows local customers to access real-time product availability at your brick-and-mortar store, helping to attract more local customers which boost your offline sales.
vendors.option1Text: You receive new items and you add it to your Vesko's online store (your customer will be informed about new products).
vendors.option2Text: Your customers will be able to see your store's inventory to check product's availability before buying it online or in store.
vendors.option3Text: Customer will be able book product, buy online & pickup in store, or have it deliver to their doors.
vendors.option4Text: After an item is being purchased, Vesko's store will update the item inventory balance.
vendors.veskoOmnichannelDifferHeading: Vesko's Omnichannel Unifies Your Retail Presence
vendors.veskoOmnichannelDifferText: Vesko enables you to list the same item online and offline, the first platform in the world to have this feature. Means that you can fulfil online orders even from store shelves.
vendors.onlineStoreOverviewHeading2: designed to help you grow your brand.
vendors.onlineStoreHeading: A marketplace, but it's your own online store
vendors.onlineStoreHeading1: A marketplace, but it's your own
vendors.onlineStoreText: With a built in inventory management system and own search engine,Vesko's store can meet your needs whether you're growing your brand or you have already a big store with hundreds of different products.
vendors.benefitsOption1Text: A predefined and customisable categorising process helps you to sort your product and do upselling.
vendors.benefitsOption2Text: Designed to help you fulfil and send an order out for delivery in few clicks.
vendors.benefitsOption3Text: Vesko's advance categorising and grouping system helps you to sell more even in the checkout process.
vendors.benefitsOption4Text: A comprehensive sales stats that help you in optimising and managing your store & sales.
vendors.logisticPaymentText: Vesko's stores come equipped with integrated logistics and payment solutions provided by industry leaders. Both will be fully operational and announced prior to Vesko's official launch.
vendors.pointofSaleText: Transform Your Checkout Process to Improve Your Customers' Purchasing Experience
